thread.title: Ground News - Direct line Prague-Tokyo? Lipavsky signs deal in Japan
thread.title_full: Ground News - Direct line Prague-Tokyo? Lipavsky signs deal in Japan

author: Novinky.cz
title: Ground News - Direct line Prague-Tokyo? Lipavsky signs deal in Japan
text: The Czech Republic is closer to launching a direct air link with Japan. Foreign Minister Jan Lipavsky (Pirates) and his Japanese counterpart Yoko Kamikawa signed an air agreement in Tokyo on Thursday evening, which is a prerequisite for the launch of the link. Summary by Novinky.cz 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] Novinky.cz The Czech Republic is closer to launching a direct air link with Japan.
